name: Rainy Day Rabbit Holes: Pacific Northwest History and Humor

episodes.title: 51. Guru, God or Grifter? JZ Knight & Ramtha's School of Enlightenment
episodes.description: Do you want ad-free episodes, bonus content, and merch? Plus Part 2 of this episode right now? Sign up for the Patreon! Visit www.rainydayrabbitholes.com for more! How does an ordinary woman from Yelm, Washington, become the channel for a 35,000-year-old warrior spirit? And how does that turn into a multi-million-dollar new-age empire? In part one of this two-part series, we explore the rise of J.Z. Knight and the Ramtha School of Enlightenment. Together with Justin Robinson from the Rev’s Geek Out podcast, we uncover how J.Z. built her following, the allure of her mystical teachings, and the cultural backdrop that made the Pacific Northwest the perfect stage for this story. Whether you’re a skeptic or a true believer, this episode will have you questioning what you think you know about spirituality and charisma. Want to listen to Part 2 now? Join the Patreon! For just $5 per month you get ad-free episodes a day early, plus bonus episodes and more! Head on over to our website at rainydayrabbitholes.com to sign up! Want more of the Rev? Sign up for his FREE Patreon to listen! https://www.thereverendenfuego.com/revs-geek-out Want to discover your next great listen? episodes.title: Sin in the Sanctuary: Religious Sexy Time in Normandy Park
episodes.description: When does a religious group become a cult? In this episode, we venture into the scandalous world of the Community Chapel and Bible Training Center, nestled in the quiet community of Normandy Park, Washington (Shea's former home). This Pentecostal religious group had a dark underbelly of secrets and peculiar sexual practices, prompting speculation of cult-like tendencies veiled behind the guise of spirituality. This story of lust and faith in the Pacific Northwest has it all-money, sex, demons, ugly carpet-even murder. Visit www.rainydayrabbitholes.com for all of the pictures of inside Pastor Barnett's marvelous home. We now have merch !! T-shirts, sweatshirts, hats and totes! Do you want to submit a design for merch? Send it to shea@rainydayrabbitholes.com Follow the Audibly Haunted Podcas t on Spotify or wherever you get podcasts! --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/rainy-day-rabbit-holes/message
subjects: Community Chapel and Bible Training Center
